results.description: Crewe Alexandra sign Norwegian striker Chuma Anene: from Danish Superliga side FC Midtjylland on loan for the rest of the season.
results.shortTitle: Crewe bring in striker Anene on loan
results.title: Chuma Anene: Crewe Alexandra sign striker from FC Midtjylland on loan

thumbnail.altText: Chuma Anene has played in the Russian Premier League and in Macedonia and Kazakhstan, as well as in Norway and Denmark

results.description: Brazilian winger Malcom joins Zenit St Petersburg from Barcelona in a 40m euro (£36.5m) deal.
results.title: Malcom: Brazilian winger joins Zenit St Petersburg from Barcelona

results.description: CSKA Moscow sign Croatian midfielder Nikola Vlasic from Everton in deal worth about £14m.
results.shortTitle: Vlasic leaves Everton for CSKA Moscow
results.title: Nikola Vlasic: CSKA Moscow sign Everton midfielder in £14m deal

results.description: Two Russia internationals have been jailed after being found guilty of hooliganism following two incidents in Moscow in October.
results.title: Russia internationals Aleksandr Kokorin and Pavel Mamaev jailed for hooliganism

results.description: Former Premier League striker Pavel Pogrebnyak is fined £2,950 for saying it was "laughable" to have black players playing for Russia.
results.shortTitle: Russian fined for black player comments
results.title: Pavel Pogrebnyak: Former Russia striker fined for comments about black players

results.description: Gary Lineker speaks to Alistair Mann who was at the King Power Stadium to find out what he knows after the news that Leicester's owners helicopter has crashed.
results.shortTitle: It's a serious situation - commentator on Leicester helicopter crash
results.title: Leicester: It's a serious situation - commentator on helicopter crash

thumbnail.altText: Police at the King Power Stadium

results.description: Two Russia internationals could face jail after being charged with hooliganism by Moscow police over an attack on a civil servant.
results.title: Russia internationals Aleksandr Kokorin & Pavel Mamaev charged by police over attack

results.description: Midfielder Nikola Vlasic, on loan from Everton, earns CSKA a point in the Moscow derby against Spartak.
results.shortTitle: Vlasic earns CSKA draw in Moscow derby
results.title: CSKA Moscow 1-1 Spartak Moscow: Nikola Vlasic earns CSKA point in derby

thumbnail.altText: Fans at the Moscow derby between CSKA and Spartak

results.description: Former Juventus midfielder Claudio Marchisio joins Zenit St Petersburg after being released by the Serie A club in August.
results.title: Claudio Marchisio: Former Juventus midfielder joins Zenit St Petersburg

results.description: Huddersfield boss David Wagner admits that he "hoped for more" against Manchester City, but "didn't expect more" after they suffered a 6-1 thrashing by the Premier League champions.
results.shortTitle: Terriers 'hoped for more, but didn't expect more' against Man City
results.title: Man City 6-1 Huddersfield: David Wagner accepts his side 'were not good enough'

results.description: Monaco sign Russia's World Cup midfielder Aleksandr Golovin from CSKA Moscow on a five-year contract.
results.shortTitle: Monaco sign Golovin from CSKA Moscow
results.title: Aleksandr Golovin: Monaco sign CSKA Moscow midfielder

results.description: Nigeria's World Cup defender Bryan Idowu says he is excited to join Russian Premier League side Lokomotiv Moscow.
results.title: Nigeria's Bryan Idowu 'excited' about Lokomotiv move

results.description: Roberto Mancini agrees to leave Zenit St Petersburg by mutual consent, the Russian club announce.
results.shortTitle: Mancini leaves Zenit by mutual consent
results.title: Zenit St Petersburg: Boss Roberto Mancini leaves Russian club amid Italy rumours

results.description: Football fans in Russia stay silent during the first half of matches in tribute to victims of a fire at a shopping and entertainment complex.
results.shortTitle: Fans stage silent tribute for fire victims
results.title: Fans in Russia stay silent in tribute to victims of Kemerovo fire

thumbnail.altText: Spartak Moscow's players during a minute's silence for the victims of the Kemerovo shopping centre fire

results.description: Belgium midfielder Axel Witsel joins Chinese side Tianjin Quanjian from Zenit St Petersburg, the Russian club confirm.
results.title: Axel Witsel: Chinese Super League side Tianjin Quanjian sign Zenit midfielder
